description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc is engaged in the financial services domain. Its core activity includes provision of insurance services.
Berkshire Hathaway Inc is engaged in the financial services domain. Its core activity includes provision of insurance services.

American International Group Inc is an insurance company. The company through its subsidiaries provides property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement products, mortgage insurance and other financial services in the United States and abroad.

Sun Life Financial Inc provides diversified financial services. It provides insurance, retirement, and wealth management products and services to individual and corporate customers in Canada, the United States and Asia.
Hartford Financial Services Group Inc provides insurance and financial services to individual and business customers in the United States.

Arch Capital Group Ltd provides insurance, reinsurance and mortgage. It provides property, casualty and mortgage insurance and reinsurance lines, and focus on writing specialty lines of insurance and reinsurance.

Aegon NV is engaged in providing life insurance, pensions and asset management products and services in the USA, Europe, and Asia. It offers life and protection, and accidental death products as well as individual savings and retirement products.

AXA Equitable Holdings Inc is engaged in providing variable annuity products, deferred investment and retirement plans, diversified investment management, research and related services, variable universal life and indexed universal life insurance.

Athene Holding Ltd is a retirement services company that issues, reinsures and acquires retirement savings products designed for the increasing number of individuals and institutions seeking to fund retirement needs.

Old Republic International Corporation is engaged in insurance underwriting and related services. It conducts its operations through General Insurance, Title Insurance, and the Republic Financial Indemnity and consumer credit indemnity Run-off Business.
Assurant Inc is a provider of specialized insurance products and related services in North America and selected other international markets.

Kemper Corp through its subsidiaries, provides automobile, homeowners, life, health, and other insurance products to individuals and businesses. It conducts its operations through two segments: Property & Casualty Insurance and Life & Health Insurance.

Enstar Group Ltd acquires and manages insurance and reinsurance companies in run-off and portfolios of insurance and reinsurance business in run-off, and providing management, consulting and other services to the insurance and reinsurance industry.

Genworth Financial Inc is a insurance holding company which operates in mortgage insurance and long-term care insurance. Its products include long-term care insurance, life insurance and fixed annuities businesses and others.

Horace Mann Educators Corp is an insurance holding company. The company markets and underwrites personal lines of property and casualty insurance, retirement products and life insurance in the United States of America.

Goosehead Insurance Inc operates as an insurance agency. It offers home, auto, motorcycle, umbrella, flood, landlord, life, business, commercial auto, product liability, and recreational insurance services.

Triple-S Management Corp is a Puerto Rico-based company serving the managed care industry. The company offers a broad portfolio of managed care products, life insurance, accident and disability insurance and property and casualty insurance.
